doc:
George Savalas https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/George_Savalas 0 Georgios Demosthenes "George" Savalas (Greek: Γεώργιος Δημοσθένης Σαβάλας) (December 5, 1924 – October 2, 1985) was an American film and television actor. He was the younger brother of actor Telly Savalas, with whom he acted in the popular 1970s TV crime series Kojak. Georgios_Demosthenes_"_George_"_Savalas ( Greek : Γεώργιος_Δημοσθένης_Σαβάλας ) ( December_5_,_1924 – October_2_,_1985 ) was an_American_film_and_television_actor . He was the_younger_brother of actor_Telly_Savalas , with whom he acted in the_popular_1970s_TV_crime_series_Kojak .
